user_instruction: 'Send the requested visitor data to Alex (alex@erc.org). You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Visitor Data Request for ERC Survey  

Dear Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. As part of the Environmental Research Coalition’s current survey on corporate environmental practices, Alex Johnson (alex@erc.org) is ready to receive the visitor data we discussed.

Could you please forward the requested visitor information at your earliest convenience? If it’s helpful, you can reference the details stored in your Notion workspace to pull the relevant figures.

Thank you very much for your assistance, and please let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
On behalf of Alex Johnson  
Survey Coordinator, Environmental Research Coalition

final_output:

Dear Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. As part of the Environmental Research Coalition’s current survey on corporate environmental practices, Alex Johnson (alex@erc.org) is ready to receive the visitor data we discussed.

Could you please forward the requested visitor information at your earliest convenience? If it’s helpful, you can reference the details stored in your Notion workspace to pull the relevant figures.

Thank you very much for your assistance, and please let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
On behalf of Alex Johnson  
Survey Coordinator, Environmental Research Coalition
